title: Photothermal effectiveness of microporous carbon nanospheres incorporated with polysulfone in direct contact membrane distillation
content:

Carbon nano-spheres (CNS) were synthesized via a hydrothermal method using D-glucose as a precursor, followed by pyrolysis in a nitrogen atmosphere.
